ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( CASE(PRIORVALUE(Lead_Stage__c), " Open",0, "Working",0, "Counselling",0, "Enrolled",0, "Partially Enrolled",0, "Closed Lost",1,
0)=1,
ISCHANGED(Lead_Stage__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not edit this lead stage because it is already Closed Won.
